common.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset the canvas? All current ideas will be lost.

error.title: Request Failed
error.cors: Request blocked, possibly due to CORS policy or network connection issues.
error.rateLimit: Too many requests (429), please try again later.
error.badRequest: Bad request (400), please check your configuration.
error.serverError: Internal server error (500), please try again later.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred, please check your network or API config.

settings.title: API Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your AI endpoints
settings.defaultModeDesc: Requests are currently being routed through the system's optimized default API service.

prompts.system:
You are a mind-mapping assistant that helps users expand their ideas layer by layer into a thinking tree.

Workflow:
1. User provides an initial idea (or selects an existing node).
2. Understand user intent based on the [Thinking Context Path] (trace from root to current node).
3. Generate 3-5 deeper or related sub-ideas.
4. Each sub-idea includes a short name and a minimal description.

Response format must be strict JSON:
{'{'}
  "nodes": [
    {'{'} "text": "Sub-idea 1 Name", "description": "One-sentence description" {'}'},
    {'{'} "text": "Sub-idea 2 Name", "description": "One-sentence description" {'}'}
  ]
{'}'}

Note: Return ONLY JSON, no explanation.
prompts.image: A beautiful book art illustration, theme: {prompt}. Style: Exquisite picture book aesthetic, warm tones, soft lighting, elegant and poetic composition that tells a story. Details: High-quality brushwork, minimalist yet decorative, suitable as a visual centerpiece for a mind map. STRICT REQUIREMENT: No text, letters, or characters in the image.
prompts.deepDivePrompt:
Please provide a deep and detailed analysis of 【{topic}】. Requirements:
1. Clear structure, including background, core principles, key elements, and practical applications.
2. Professional yet easy-to-understand language.
3. Total length around 300-500 words.
4. Output the body text directly, do not use JSON format, and do not include any opening or closing remarks.
prompts.summaryPrompt:
You are a thinking summary expert. Please generate a structured summary based on the provided mind map node information (including the core idea and all branched sub-ideas).

Node data:
{nodes}

Requirements:
1. Extract the core theme and its underlying logic.
2. Summarize several main dimensions or branch directions.
3. Conclude with final insights or conclusions.
4. Language should be concise, professional, and inspiring.
5. Output the summary content directly, do not use JSON format, and do not include any opening remarks.
